entry.title: Pretty bullish forecast - an etf would add $100M of daily demand vs $25M of daily supply. Even if @fundstrat is right on equilibrium demand, would flo...
entry.summary:
Pretty bullish forecast - an etf would add $100M of daily demand vs $25M of daily supply. Even if @fundstrat is right on equilibrium demand, would flows begin before the halving assuming an etf is approved? To extent an etf is approved, seems like a â€œmax longâ€ catalyst.
